root: ^Now that you are properly attired in the vestments of our ancestors, you are prepared to light a candle in the hallowed sanctuary of our church.
^Is it true that the light from the candles can guide the spirits of our loved ones to the afterlife?

g-0: ^It is said that the flame of the candle is a beacon for the souls of the departed.

c-2: ^But it is not for us to question such matters. We must simply have faith in the traditions that have been handed down to us
